mapper.insert: INSERT INTO research (research_id, research_title, research_purpose, research_method, researcher, reward_type, reward_value, take_time, research_type) VALUES (research_seq.NEXTVAL, #{researchTitle}, #{researchPurpose}, #{researchMethod}, #{researcher}, #{rewardType}, #{rewardValue}, #{takeTime}, #{researchType})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM research A WHERE A.researcher IN (SELECT B.user_id FROM members B WHERE B.major=#{major} AND B.member_type='대학원생')
mapper.update: UPDATE research SET permit=#{permit} WHERE research_id=#{researchId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO classes (class_id, teacher_name, teacher_id, class_name, class_schedule, need_credit) VALUES (class_seq.NEXTVAL, #{teacherName}, #{teacherId}, #{className}, #{classSchedule}, #{needCredit})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM classes WHERE class_id=#{classId} AND teacher_id=#{teacherId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO taking_class (pair_number, student_id, student_name, class_id, required_credit) VALUES (pairNum_seq.NEXTVAL, #{studentId}, #{studentName}, #{classId}, #{requiredCredit})

INSERT INTO timeslot (timeslot_id, research_id, researcher, research_date, start_time, end_time, people_limit, location_name) VALUES (ts_seq.NEXTVAL, #{researchId}, #{researcher}, #{researchDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{peopleLimit}, #{locationName})
mapper.select: SELECT accommodate FROM location_tb WHERE location_name=#{locationName}
SELECT * FROM timeslot WHERE research_id=#{researchId} ORDER BY research_date DESC, start_time DESC

SELECT * FROM timeslot WHERE research_date BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:SS') ORDER BY research_date ASC, start_time ASC, location_name DESC
